categoryName: Gift Ideas to Express Your Sympathy
categoryBlurb: There is no loss more profound than that of a loved one - and it can be difficult to convey your sympathy in a meaningful way. At GiftStarter, we know how challenging it can be to find an item of remembrance that conveys the right sentiment, so we have curated our favorite ideas to honors the lives of those we have lost.
categoryMetaDescription: Find the perfect gift of meaning and remembrance that conveys the right sentiment. Here is a list of gift ideas to honor the lives of those we have lost.

productList.productName: Personalized Memorial Bench with Marble Memorial Plaque- "Forever remembered Forever missed."
productList.productDescription:
These remembrance garden benches are handmade in the USA. Made of stone cast concrete, each bench has the look, feel and weight of true stone. Weatherproof and durable, this bench offers a permanent and touching way to honor a loved one. Verse reads, "Forever remembered Forever missed." Bench features a personalized marble plaque where names, dates or sentiments can be engraved (3 line maximum with 18 character limit per line).   Plaque size is 5x7. Bench measures 12" X 29" X 15".  Weight: 75  


 


ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE:  This item normally ships in 5-10 business days directly from the manufacturer.


 


ESTIMATED TRANSIT TIME:  1-5 business days.
productList.productMetaDescription: A meaningful gift that offers a permanent and touching way to remember with a personalized memorial bench thatâ€™s weatherproof and durable.

productList.productName: Memorial Pendant "I'll carry you within my heart until we meet again."
productList.productDescription:
This heart necklace features the remembrance verse, "I'll carry you within my heart until we meet again." A sterling silver chain is included with this lovely memorial necklace.


 


ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE: In-stock orders normally ship in 1-2 business days. Orders for out of stock items normally ship in 7-10 business days.


 


ESTIMATED DELIVERY TIME: 1-5 business days.
productList.productMetaDescription: The perfect and meaningful gift idea to remember someone that has been lost.  It has a touching verse to memorialize the personal memory

productList.productDescription:
The International Star Registry is proud to introduce our Ultimate Star Naming Kit, a comprehensive package including everything you could ever need to celebrate your newly named star. This Ultimate Star Naming Kit comes complete with the certificate, astronomy booklet, and star charts that we include in all of our packages. In addition, the Ultimate Star Naming Kit comes with a 20" x 16" frame, which your certificate is double matted in. As an added bonus, your personalized star chart also comes in a professional frame that matches the certificate. Buy and name your star today!


 


Ultimate Star Kit includes:

  • The frame measures 20" X 16" and was designed specifically for the gift package.

  • The certificate is framed for the deluxe and ultimate package.

  • The certificate comes beautifully double matted in this frame. The outer mat is a cream colored "flannel" and the inner mat is a dark delft blue which matches the colors in the certificate.

  • The personalized star chart is framed also in this package and matches the certificate frame.

  • The package also includes a complimentary personalized wallet card imprinted with the star name and coordinates.

All kits include:

  • A beautiful 16" X 12" full color parchment certificate personalized with the star name, date and coordinates.

  • A personalized 16" X 12" sky chart containing the star name, star date, the constellation and the location circled in red where the star is in the sky.

  • A booklet on astronomy written by a professional astronomer with additional sky charts.

  • A letter of congratulations/memorial for the recipient.
productList.productMetaDescription: The perfect gift idea is the Ultimate Star Naming Kit to forever honor the life of those we have lost. It includes everything, complete with certificate, astronomy booklet.

productList.productDescription: Express your sincere condolences with this elegant all-white arrangement of roses, lilies, stock, daisy poms and monte casino.  A peaceful tribute that offers treasured memories of loved ones.  Delivery is available Wednesday, Thursday or Friday only.
productList.productMetaDescription: To honor the life of those we have lost, this is the perfect meaningful gift. Express sincere condolence with this elegant flower arrangement of roses, lilies,

productList.productDescription: Send your condolences with lovely Spathiphyllum plant, also known as the Peace Lily. A terrific gesture that lets them know you're thinking about them, this easy-to-care for plant provides a lasting tribute. Arriving in a classic planter, it's an appropriate way to express your sympathy at the most difficult of times.  Delivery is available Wednesday, Thursday or Friday only.
productList.productMetaDescription: Send this gift of condolences with this symbolic plant letting them know that you care.  The plan is easy-to-care for and is a simple way to express sympathy.

productList.productName: Cherished Memories Rose Half Casket Cover - Yellow
productList.productDescription: Every moment spent with your loved one is a memory you want to hold onto forever. Celebrate a life well-lived and loved with this beautiful yellow casket spray of beautiful yelow flowers, crafted by expert florists, for a fitting final tribute.  This beautiful casket cover reflects your deepest compassion and respect for a life well-lived and loved.
productList.productMetaDescription: A beautiful and meaningful gift idea to remember the loss of a loved one with beautiful yellow flowers, crafted by expert florists.  A compassionate way to express sympathy.

productList.productName: Cherished Memories Rose Half Casket Cover - White
productList.productDescription: Every moment spent with your loved one is a memory you want to hold onto forever. Commemorate their life, and all the feelings you have for them, with this beautiful white casket cover, crafted by our expert florists with long stem white roses, for a fitting final tribute.

productList.productName: Sincerest Sorrow - Yellow and White Flowers
productList.productDescription: An elegant floral expression of your care and concern, our abundant arrangement of roses, lilies, snapdragons, yarrow, alstroemeria and more in bright and beautiful yellow and white offers a comforting tribute during times of sorrow.

Remember a loved one who has passed on with a stunning tribute arrangement. The elegance of pastel-colored roses, lilies, gladiolas, stock, snapdragons and more offers your heartfelt memories of a beautiful life.

productList.productName: Steak Combo with Vegetables Care Package
productList.productDescription: This care package features the four most popular steaks. Enjoy fork-tender Filet Mignons, bold New York Strips, mouthwatering Ribeyes and hearty Tops Sirloins.  Included are 4 types of steaks to take care of any person or family’s protein for their meals during a time of need.  There are four of each type: 4 (6 oz.) Filet Mignons, 4 (8 oz.) Ribeyes, 4 (8 oz.) Top Sirloins and 4 (10 oz.) Boneless Strips.  In addition, the care packages also includes 11 pounds of colorful artisanal fresh vegetables. They will receive a bounty of brightly colored potato varieties, beautiful beets and radishes, big, chunky celery root and plenty of bright orange, yellow, and purple carrots.
productList.productMetaDescription: A meaningful and nutritious gift idea to help those in grieving eat well.  Express your compassion and sympathy with this care packages of steaks and vegetables.
